website_summaries.verdict: A rustic looking holiday tray that is ideal for serving drinks.
pros: Metal and rope give the tray a rustic look
The raised edge is ideal for serving holiday drinks
Sits at a low price point
Tray feels durable and well made
Lightweight and easy to wipe clean
cons: Merry and Bright decal may not be perfectly centered

customer_reviews.title: Quality control
customer_reviews.text: I want to first off say the delivery of this items with Prime is amazing. I ordered this as a gift for a housewarming. I received it in one day. When I received it and opened it I was disappointed the decal was off center and crooked. I figured this was just a very poor quality control issue so I ordered another one. The 2nd one I received was perfect. I think I would have been more upset if I didn’t have prime with free returns. The tray is great for the price of $16. Anything more and it would be a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not as described...sorry  🤓
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this tray. Very cheap looking and cheap feel to it. Wish I returned it. Cannot even give it for a white elephant gift because it cost too much. Sitting in a closet where it will stay. Sorry Brownlow. Thought it would be more elegant for a house gift. I don’t like to give negative reviews but wya too costly for the look.
customer_reviews.author: Vicko

customer_reviews.title: Poor print quality, but sturdy tray
customer_reviews.text: The print wasn’t finished. Part of the “y” was missing, which cheapened the look of the tray. I didn’t have time to return it - shame on me for assuming I wouldn’t need to worry about that.
customer_reviews.author: Roxalou

customer_reviews.title: Decorative
customer_reviews.text: This came bigger than I expected and so cute! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Skyler L

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, but doesn't lie flat, looks warped. I kept it anyway, hate sending things back. I use it for cloth napkins.

customer_reviews.title: Modern farmhouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister who is remodeling her house with a modern farmhouse feel. She loved it and it will look good with her style. Felt good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose tray - farmhouse decor
customer_reviews.text: A cute little tray that can be used for many different things. I currently have it leaned on the back splash in the corner wall of my kitchen. I previously had it in the middle of my dining room table. We recently remodeled my kitchen in farmhouse decor. I don't know how well the paint on it will hold up as I have not put anything in it. The handles are rope like but softer. It is fairly sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough tray
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough tray. Came warped, but the tin is thin so you can persuade it to lay flat. Not the greatest quality, but decent for the price. It's big, too.

customer_reviews.title: It was great until I noticed the tin on the bottom was ...
customer_reviews.text: It was great until I noticed the tin on the bottom was uneven, causing it to pop/not lay flat. Disappointed in that, but my friend who I gave it to as a gift loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect round table tray.
customer_reviews.text: Cute galvanized tray for coffee table, island, or kitchen table. Cute for food and drinks too. Love the rope handles. Can't beat the price too!

product_meta.title: Brownlow Gifts Galvanized Metal Round Serving Tray, Merry and Bright
product_meta.description: Color:Merry and BrightBring a touch of vintage to the home with serving trays that are heavy duty durable without sacrificing style. Gorgeous galvanized tin serving trays have heavy jute handles and a charming sentiment printed on the tray. Brownlow Gifts began from a desire to create gifts that would last much longer than flowers and give hope and inspiration long after flowers are gone. Brownlow Gifts has grown into creating inspirational, fashion accessory, paper, and baby gifts along with a selection of giftable kitchen items. The Brownlow Gifts family business continues making products that inspire people and help them connect with the people they love.
feature_bullets: Vintage style serving tray in galvanized tin with heavy jute handles
Round tray is 12-inches in diameter, 1.75-inches deep
Features image of festive snowflakes and sentiment in red ink, reads: Merry and Bright
Heavy duty and charming to boot, stylish serveware is great for holiday parties
Look for Brownlow's coordinating, functional and giftable home decor and inspirational items

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars305 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
